name: Like Flies To Confectionery
description:
*IF YOU SEE A BLACK SCREEN, JUST GIVE IT A FEW SECONDS TO LOAD*

A game about picking up baked goods while avoiding nasty, giant flies.

CONTROLS:

RIGHT MOUSE: MOVE FORWARD

LEFT MOUSE : THROW KNIFE

MOUSE WHEEL : ZOOM

INFO:

Made for "Mini-Jam 94: Baking" with the limitation of 'Only 2 Buttons'.

Finished in 21 non-consecutive hours.
